WorkItem.Description:
Import latest changes to Shared/OLE.php etc. from PEAR CVS.
Â 
The OLE reader/writer originally comes from the OLE PEAR package, http://pear.php.net/package/OLE. I recenlly made some check-ins to that package that are necessary to read Excel5 files (work item 2841). These changes include a rewrite of the parser to  properly use Big Block, Small Block and Master Block Allocation Tables (the old implementation caused problems with "fragmented" files), and the addition of a stream reader.
WorkItem.Summary: Update Shared/OLE.php to latest version from PEAR
